entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , London
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:06 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -6.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 08:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -6.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -9.9°C
Wind: W 30 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries at times heavy. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending late this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow early this morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 07:59 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 07:59 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 6. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 07:59 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
